resources.string: - View the information about this application by clicking on the corresponding icon.\n\n

- Enter the ingredient (name of the dish), click on the "Add" button, the ingredient you added (name) will appear in a separate field.

- Click on the "Search" button to search by the added ingredients (names)..

- To remove the added ingredients (names), click on the corresponding button.

- When you click on the recipe, you will be able to read it in more detail. To read the instructions for the recipe, follow the link.

- You will be presented with a list of notes (recipes).

- To view a note, click on the corresponding note.

- By clicking on the "Create a new recipe" button, create a note by filling in the fields.
The application "My Cook Book" is an application that will help you learn various recipes, as well as save your own recipes\n
Developed by Mikhail Deshin and Ilya Gorokhov
